name: df-ehl
body: |- wceq(cehl, cmpt(s0, cn0, cfv(crrx, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define a function generating the real Euclidean spaces of finite dimension. The case ` n = 0 ` corresponds to a space of dimension 0, that is, limited to a neutral element (see ~ ehl0 ). Members of this family of spaces are Hilbert spaces, as shown in - ehlhl . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
